overview:
Groupe Brandonology is a boutique design and branding agency founded and directed by Dale Brandon Kan, headquartered in New York City with a satellite office in Paris, France.

The agency strategizes and consults on style, beauty, visual presence and substance for brand categories such as cosmetics, fashion, consumer products and luxury lifestyles.

Dale Brandon Kan leads an impressive international team of experienced designers and brand strategists offering a full range of expertise in fields such as industrial, environmental and graphic design, packaging, media communication, global marketing, fashion and beauty casting, and brand consulting, as well as a unique approach to global trend forecasting. For every project, the team crafts custom-tailored concepts for each client and strategic partner.
